subject: bulldozing for content
body:
![image.png](/letters/images/426.webp)

here's an erasure i did of the _New York Times_ article "[What Israeli Soldiers’ Videos Reveal: Cheering Destruction and Mocking Gazans](https://www.nytimes.com/2024/02/06/world/middleeast/israel-idf-soldiers-war-social-media-video.html)" (you can hear me reading a slightly different version [here](https://www.instagram.com/absence.of.field/reel/C3DfsNJxiX9/))![image.png](/letters/images/424.jpg)![image.png](/letters/images/422.jpg)![image.png](/letters/images/425.jpg)![image.png](/letters/images/423.jpg)![image.png](/letters/images/428.jpg)![image.png](/letters/images/429.jpg)![image.png](/letters/images/431.jpg)![image.png](/letters/images/430.jpg)![image.png](/letters/images/427.jpg)![image.png](/letters/images/432.webp)
